
```{r load_data}
# Load preprocessed glutamatergic cells
obj.opossum.glutamatergic <- readRDS(paste0(dir.list$snrna$seurat$raw, "opossum_v1_glutamatergic_raw.rds"))
```

```{r initial_clustering}
# Initial low-resolution clustering
obj.opossum.glutamatergic <- ClusterWithSCT(obj.opossum.glutamatergic, 1)
clust.plots <- PlotClusters(obj.opossum.glutamatergic)
# Save plots for Figure S1
save.plots <- list("dimplot_cluster" = "S1K_Opossum-Glutamatergic-Cluster-DimPlot")
for (sp in names(save.plots)) {
  SavePNGandSVG(clust.plots[[sp]], dir.list$figS1$plots, save.plots[[sp]])
}
```

```{r canonical_markers}
# Define canonical glutamatergic markers
canon.markers <- list(
  class = c("Slc17a6", "Slc17a7", "Sv2b"),
  L23 = c("Cux2", "Ccbe1", "Mdga1", "Stard8"),
  L4 = c("Whrn", "Rorb"),
  L5IT = c("Bcl11b"),
  L5NP = c("Nxph1", "Tshz2", "Trhr", "Slc17a8"),
  L5PT = c("Bcl6", "Erg", "Reln"),
  L6CT = c("Foxp2", "Syt6"),
  L6IT = c("Zfp804b", "Cdh9"),
  L6b = c("Ctgf", "Inpp4b", "Svil")
)

# Visualize canonical markers
DefaultAssay(obj.opossum.glutamatergic) <- "RNA"
Idents(obj.opossum.glutamatergic) <- "SCT_snn_res.1"
PlotFeatures(obj.opossum.glutamatergic, canon.markers)
DotPlot(obj.opossum.glutamatergic, features = canon.markers, cols = c("lightgrey", "red"), scale = FALSE) + 
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, vjust = 0.25)) + 
  theme(panel.background = element_rect(fill = "white", color = NA), 
        plot.background = element_rect(fill = "white", color = NA)) + NoLegend()
```


```{r multi_resolution_clustering}
PlotClusters(obj.opossum.glutamatergic, group.id = "SCT_snn_res.1.5")

DotPlot(obj.opossum.glutamatergic, features = canon.markers, cols = c("lightgrey", "red"), scale = FALSE) +
```

```{r compute_cluster_markers}
# Compute differential expression markers for clusters within each subclass
subclass.labels <- c("IT_A", "IT_B", "IT_C", "L5PT", "L6CT")
ident.labels <- c("SCT_snn_res.0.2", "SCT_snn_res.0.5", "SCT_snn_res.1.5")

markers.opossum.glutamatergic <- IdentMarkerDict(
  obj.opossum.glutamatergic, 
  subclass.labels, 
  ident.labels,
  paste0(dir.list$pre$data, "opossum/glutamatergic/markerdict_clusters.rds")
)

# Save dot plots and feature plots
SaveDotPlots(
  obj.opossum.glutamatergic, 
  markers.opossum.glutamatergic,
  subclass.labels, 
  ident.labels,
  paste0(dir.list$pre$plots, "opossum/glutamatergic/"),
  "ENSMODG"
)

SaveFeaturePlots(
  obj.opossum.glutamatergic, 
  markers.opossum.glutamatergic,
  subclass.labels, 
  ident.labels,
  paste0(dir.list$pre$plots, "opossum/glutamatergic/")
)
```

```{r label_cells}
# Assign final subclass and type labels
obj.opossum.glutamatergic$subclass <- NA
obj.opossum.glutamatergic$type <- NA

subclass.resolutions <- rev(list(
  IT_A = 0.5, 
  IT_B = 0.5, 
  IT_C = 0.5, 
  IT_D = 0.5, 
  L5PT = 1.5, 
  L5NP = 0.5, 
  L6CT = 1.5, 
  L6b = 0.5
))
obj.opossum.glutamatergic <- LabelCells(obj.opossum.glutamatergic, subclass.resolutions)
```

```{r NA_subclass_type}
# Check UMAP for cells with NA subclass or type
# These could arise when partitioning with different clustering resolutions
for (label in c("subclass", "type")) { 
  if (any(is.na(obj.opossum.glutamatergic@meta.data[[label]]))) {
    # Assign labels for NA cells using nearest neighbors
    label.nn <- paste0(label, ".nn")
    obj.opossum.glutamatergic <- LabelByNearestNeighbors(
      obj.opossum.glutamatergic,
      ident = label,
      output_col = label.nn,
      reduction = "pca",
      dims = 1:30,
      fraction = 0.20,
      n.neighbors = 50
    )
    # Check NN assignments
    print(table(obj.opossum.glutamatergic@meta.data[[label.nn]]))
    # Transfer to final labels
    na.cells <- is.na(obj.opossum.glutamatergic@meta.data[[label]])
    obj.opossum.glutamatergic@meta.data[[label]][na.cells] <- obj.opossum.glutamatergic@meta.data[[label.nn]][na.cells]
    # Re-check for unassigned cells (called "None", NA are already labeled cells in new column)
    print(any(obj.opossum.glutamatergic@meta.data[[label]] == "None"))
  }
}
```
